```{R}
# Part I
control <- c(1035.581,1180.201,1091.105,1030.416,1160.832) # 5 values
tsc1clone <- c(2087.948,1154.376,1324.821,1268.006,1213.773) # 5 values
print(paste(mean(control), " is the mean area in microns of control ommatidia"))
print(paste(mean(tsc1clone), " is the mean area in microns of mutant tsc1 clone ommatidia"))
meancontr<-mean(control)
meanexptl<-mean(tsc1clone)
print(paste("The difference between the mean area of WT control ommatidia and mean area of mutant tsc1 clone ommatidiais:", meanexptl-meancontr))

```
